constituent: perusal, retainer, slave, reclining, lying down, one, floor, look, see, telescope, eye, human legs
koohiiStory1: The slave reclines on the floor at night to watch the stars. Since that´s the only thing the slave is allowed to “read”, he does so very thoroughly and diligently, hence perusal.
koohiiStory2: [+scottamus] "Please, come in and peruse this fine selection of slaves, all reclining here on the floor for your perusal. Have a look here": http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/09/Slave_ship_diagram.png/440px-Slave_ship_diagram.png.
myStory: ngắm cảnh. chữ Lãm. nô thần đi theo và người nằm trên phản ngắm nhìn
